DeviceProperties.ServiceAttributesFormulas: [{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"RC Operation Mode"},"ReadFormula":"var om := MODBUSR(A, 51, UInt16);\r\nSwitch(om, 0, \u0022Idle/Fan\u0022, 1, \u0022Heating\u0022, 2, \u0022Cooling\u0022, 3, \u0022Heat \u0026 Cool\u0022, \u0022Unknown\u0022);"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Return Air Min"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(A, 25, Uint16)/100 \u002B \u0022\u00B0C\u0022"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Return Air Max"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(A, 26, Uint16)/100 \u002B \u0022\u00B0C\u0022"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Return Air Average"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(A, 23, Uint16)/100 \u002B \u0022\u00B0C\u0022"}]
